div.div: API summary (generated from the capabilityStatement resource)

div.p: A FHIR API in front of the New Zealand NHI

td.p: Used to retrieve a Patient resource by Id.

$Match (Find NHI) with in parameter onlyCertainMatches: 0 (False) An operation to search the NHI by demographics using fuzzy logic. Returns a bundle of results with match scores, $Match (Validate) with in parameter onlyCertainMatches: 1 (True) An operation to validate known patient demographic details against an NHI number. Returns a bundle of results with one patient resource that includes the live nhi-id
an operation to set the patient.name.preferred boolean to True.
